documentation.author: b096209
documentation.purpose: This is a copy of the sepsis alert rule with the action templates modified to use a ccl script to send spsis alerts to patient safe phones

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXPERT_TRIGGER_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the Expert trigger is listed in TRIGGER.

statements.statement: select trigger_name="Double click in lower box to enter trigger name(s)" from (dummyt d with seq = 1)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXEC_CCL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Execute PROGRAM_NAME with parameters OPT_PARAM and link to OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PLAN_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Active plans POWERPLAN exist OPT_TIME_QUAL OPT_TIME_VALUE OPT_TIME_UNIT from current date/time for person OPT_LINK.
templateDefinitions.description: Active plans POWERPLAN exist OPT_TIME_QUAL OPT_TIME_VALUE OPT_TIME_UNIT from current date/time for person OPT_LINK.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PREVIOUS_ACTION_L
templateDefinitions.definition: If previous action of ACTION_NAME was executed for SCOPE OPT_LINK initiated by PERSONNEL user in last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT
templateDefinitions.description: If previous action of ACTION_NAME was executed for SCOPE OPT_LINK initiated by PERSONNEL user in last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_BUILD_MESSAGE_L
templateDefinitions.definition: ACTION a message named MSGNAME with text of MSGTEXT preceded by OPT_DELIMITER
templateDefinitions.description: Create or add to a text message to be used by subsequent templates

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Create" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Append To" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "1" elseif (d.seq = 2) "2" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_BUILD_MESSAGE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: ACTION a message named MSGNAME with text of MSGTEXT preceded by OPT_DELIMITER
templateDefinitions.description: Create or add to a text message to be used by subsequent templates

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Create" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Append To" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "1" elseif (d.seq = 2) "2" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXEC_CCL_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Execute a program PROGRAM_NAME with parameters OPT_PARAM and link to OPT_LINK.

values.value: To FullAudit for this module only

value.value: select into 'nl:' from pathway p where p.person_id = trigger_personid and p.pathway_catalog_id in (2600444695.00, 2188974243.00) and p.pw_status_cd = 996990.00 and p.start_dt_tm BETWEEN CNVTLOOKBEHIND("90,MIN") AND CNVTDATETIME(CURDATE,CURTIME3) head report log_misc1 = 'YES' go

select into 'nl:' from pathway p where p.person_id = trigger_personid and p.pathway_catalog_id = 2552113791.00 and p.pw_status_cd = 996990.00 and p.start_dt_tm BETWEEN CNVTLOOKBEHIND("90,MIN") AND CNVTDATETIME(CURDATE,CURTIME3) head report log_misc1 = 'YES' go

select into 'nl:' from pathway p where p.person_id = trigger_personid and p.pathway_catalog_id in (1611542859.00,2552111305.00) and p.pw_status_cd = 996990.00 and p.start_dt_tm BETWEEN CNVTLOOKBEHIND("90,MIN") AND CNVTDATETIME(CURDATE,CURTIME3) head report log_misc1 = 'YES' go

select into 'nl:' from pathway p where p.person_id = trigger_personid and p.pathway_catalog_id = 2596776629.00 and p.pw_status_cd = 996990.00 and p.start_dt_tm BETWEEN CNVTLOOKBEHIND("360,MIN") AND CNVTDATETIME(CURDATE,CURTIME3) head report log_misc1 = 'YES' go

values.value: Comfort Meds End of Life Adult Subphase

value.value: SIRS Alert: This patient has met at least 3 SIRS criteria. Please assess the patient and follow facility policy for SIRS Alert.
Sepsis Alert: The patient has met criteria for sepsis. Please assess the patient and follow facility policy for Sepsis Alert.
SIRS Alert: This patient has met at least 3 SIRS criteria. Please assess the patient and follow facility policy for SIRS Alert.
Sepsis Alert: This patient has met criteria for sepsis. Please assess the patient and follow facility policy for Sepsis Alert.
